short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An encrypted, intelligent way to bookmark with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet your new browsing companion. Fast, intelligent, and private — Pluq has reinvented bookmarking.

---------- PRIVACY FIRST ----------
We collect only essential account and usage data. Your bookmarks stay private and are accessible only by you through client-side encryption.


---------- BROWSER EXTENSION ----------
Save bookmarks and access Pluq from your browser.

• Bookmark anything with one click
Just right-click and select Pluq to bookmark web pages, images, videos, and links.

• Access directly from your browser
Integrated and accessible from your browser's built-in side panel.

• Find anything with AI-powered search
Search bookmarks with semantic search and contextual understanding powered by AI.

• Without leaving your browser
Preview, organize, and manage bookmarks straight from the browser side panel.


---------- WEB APPLICATION ----------
Want a better view? Open the Pluq web app by clicking the pinned extension icon.

• Semantic Search & Contextual Understanding
Our AI search algorithm finds what you need by understanding context and meaning, without compromising security.

• Secure Cloud Storage
Organize and scale to thousands of bookmarks without limits. All bookmarks are synced and encrypted in the cloud.
